data.title: Pink Roses Teal Magnolias
data.meta_site_name: The Cooper Foundation | Making the extraordinary possible through the power of philanthropy.
data.text:
Pink Roses & Teal Magnolias is a movement that embraces the power of hope and the strength of sisterhood in helping women on their cancer journey.

Your contribution to The Cooper Foundation's Pink Roses & Teal Magnolias fund supports the research, diagnosis and treatment of women's cancer at MD Anderson Cancer Center at Cooper.

All donations to Pink and Teal stay local, right here at MD Anderson at Cooper in Camden.

Your generosity helps us create a world where cancer is easier to detect and diagnose and where every person touched by the disease is successfully treated.

Donations can be made any time to the Pink & Teal fund for women's cancer by filling out the donation form via the button below:

Here are some other ways to support the Pink & Teal movement:

Attend the annual Pink Roses, Teal Magnolias fundraiser event

Host your own fundraising event as a community partner

Fundraise via Facebook

You can find out more about each of these options below.

It only takes one idea to make a big impact! We welcome the opportunity to partner with organizations who share our passion for making a difference. No effort is too big or too small â€“ because everything you do brings us closer to making cancer history.

The Cooper Foundation helps community partners promote their events by providing flyer templates and other promotional materials and can also publicize your event on our website and social media channels.
